label: AccountingAccount
comment: A specific trade account for recording debits and credits to general accounting, cost accounting or budget accounting.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the type of trade accounting account, such as general (main), secondary, cost accounting or budget account.
The code specifying the amount type for this trade accounting account.
A code specifying a set trigger for this trade accounting account to be used in response to a specific event or a set of events.
The cost reference dimension pattern, expressed as text, for this trade accounting account.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.

referencedBy.comment: A payable accounting account specified for this header trade settlement.
